page.title: 20Religion
page.content: The area has a number of churches and chapels.The christian faith is followed in the Calvinistic,Presbyterian chapels,or in the Churches.There are also Catholic churches as well as the Church of England meeting houses. Recently other forms of worship have made their niche in the local commmunity,mainly the Jehovah witnesses and the Seventh day adventists.These new worshippers have their own meeting places,such as old church houses or community centres. We however found that only a very low % of the young went to chapel or church regularly.
